category: news
title: "Drivers to set safe AI limits?"
excerpt: "AI and ML organisations, conferences, and journals have started implementing governance mechanisms to ensure researchers confront potential negative consequences of their work. Ethics review processes that facilitate reflection on potential risks and impacts on society have been integrated within peer review."
